name: moss stitch dishcloth
notes:
the moss stitch is my go-to stitch whenever i want to crochet something easy.

i wrote this pattern for a dishcloth using the moss stitch, because i think the fabric created from this stitch is a great option for a dishcloth.
it is also a great option for a simple but elegant blanket, if you're looking for mindless crocheting!

i think it looks so beautiful with multicolor yarn, but it will also look really good with a solid color.
